Product_Description: Our Christmas Hot Chocolate is a festive treat made with luxurious ingredients. We start with rich; dark chocolate and add in generous amounts of cinnamon; nutmeg; and a hint of peppermint. Perfect for snuggling up by the fireplace; this hot chocolate is sure to get you in the holiday spirit.
Indulge in our rich and creamy Dark Chocolate Hot Chocolate. Made with the finest quality cocoa and melted chocolate; this luxurious drink is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth.

Our Dark Chocolate Orange Hot Chocolate is a unique and tasty twist on a classic hot chocolate. We start with a base of rich dark chocolate and add in a splash of orange liqueur for a burst of citrus flavor. Perfect for those who love both chocolate and orange.

Our Double Chocolate Hot Chocolate is a chocolate lover's dream come true. Made with a combination of rich; dark chocolate and creamy milk chocolate; this hot chocolate is sure to satisfy your cravings. We top it off with whipped cream and a sprinkle of chocolate shavings for an extra indulgent touch.

Our Strawberry White Chocolate Hot Chocolate is a delicious and fruity twist on a classic hot chocolate. We start with a base of creamy white chocolate and add in fresh; juicy strawberries for a burst of flavor. Perfect for a sweet and indulgent treat.

Our Vegan Hot Chocolate is a creamy and indulgent treat that is perfect for those following a plant-based diet. Made with a combination of almond milk; cocoa powder; and melted chocolate; this hot chocolate is sure to satisfy your cravings.

Our White Chocolate Hot Chocolate is a creamy and indulgent treat made with the finest quality white chocolate. Perfect for those with a sweet tooth; this hot chocolate is sure to satisfy your cravings.
